title: League of Legends luncher not opening
body:
My  problem is that after I try to open league the logo does show up bat when it disapears no luncher comes up....
I also saw some vids on yt about deleting lol_luncher and lol_patcher and it didn' t work.Another vid i saw on yt was about a folder called air_client located on RADS and then on projects but the 2 only things thet i have on the projects folder are lol_luncher and lol_patcher...
PLS HELP!!!

replies.body: The videos you're using are not official or supported, and will likely end up causing you more problems.  You should grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a clean refresh on your game to undo that.  Should you still have issues with your patcher launching, run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case your OS security settings are preventing it.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I just read another post on the league forum from a guy who was having the same problem and a rioter said the computer firewalls caused it, so I just deactivated avast antivirus (the only firewall program I have) for 10 minutes for the first time I opened the luncher and then a message showed up from avast to add league on games collection, I pressed yes and I had no problem with the game after that... 

but still thanx for answering  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
